item.title: O
item.description: score:-51 Chances: Many dividend stocks have sold off over the past year, offering attractive dividend yields. Realty Income Corp. is the 800-pound gorilla in the net-lease sector and looks like it is on sale today. These stocks offer generous dividend yields upfront and a good chance to receive growing payouts in the years ahead.
